messages.content:
Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_11 (score VARCHAR, date VARCHAR, match VARCHAR, home_away VARCHAR)
What was the score for a match before 13, and a home game on April 21, 2008?
SELECT score FROM table_name_11 WHERE match < 13 AND home_away = "home" AND date = "april 21, 2008"

Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_96 (year VARCHAR, location VARCHAR, defeated VARCHAR)
what is the year when the location is san diego, california and defeated is houston baptist (texas)?
SELECT COUNT(year) FROM table_name_96 WHERE location = "san diego, california" AND defeated = "houston baptist (texas)"

Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_10 (distance VARCHAR, stage VARCHAR, winner VARCHAR)
What distance did giovanni lombardi win after stage 5?
SELECT distance FROM table_name_10 WHERE stage > 5 AND winner = "giovanni lombardi"

Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_63 (draws INTEGER, season VARCHAR, wins VARCHAR)
What is the highest Draws for a season later than 1926 with less than 0 wins?
SELECT MAX(draws) FROM table_name_63 WHERE season > 1926 AND wins < 0

SELECT bats FROM table_name_23 WHERE first = "mitchell"

CREATE TABLE table_name_31 (election VARCHAR)
Who is the 2nd member during 1885 election?
SELECT 2 AS nd_member FROM table_name_31 WHERE election = "1885"

SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_52 (laps INTEGER, grid VARCHAR, time_retired VARCHAR, driver VARCHAR)
What was Alexander Wurz's highest laps when he has a grid less than 14 and a time/retired of +1 lap.
SELECT MAX(laps) FROM table_name_52 WHERE time_retired = "+1 lap" AND driver = "alexander wurz" AND grid < 14

Which National team has a Year of total?
SELECT national_team FROM table_name_6 WHERE year = "total"

CREATE TABLE table_name_4 (visitor VARCHAR, record VARCHAR)
Who was the visiting team when the record was 6–12–5–1?
SELECT visitor FROM table_name_4 WHERE record = "6–12–5–1"

Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_82 (county VARCHAR, rank VARCHAR, _percentage__1960_ VARCHAR, _percentage__2040_ VARCHAR, _percentage__2000_ VARCHAR)
Which county has a % (2040) larger than 1.8, a % (2000) smaller than 4.1, a % (1960) smaller than 3.2, and is ranked 13?
SELECT county FROM table_name_82 WHERE _percentage__2040_ > 1.8 AND _percentage__2000_ < 4.1 AND _percentage__1960_ < 3.2 AND rank = "13"

Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_82 (away_team VARCHAR, venue VARCHAR)
I want to know the away team score for vfl park venue
SELECT away_team AS score FROM table_name_82 WHERE venue = "vfl park"

Eres un traductor de texto a consultas SQL. Los usuarios te harán preguntas en inglés y tú generarás una consulta SQL basada en el ESQUEMA proporcionado
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_19 (goals_for INTEGER, goals_against VARCHAR, goal_difference VARCHAR, club VARCHAR)
what is the goals when the goal difference is more than -3, the club is real avilés cf and the goals against is more than 60?
SELECT SUM(goals_for) FROM table_name_19 WHERE goal_difference > -3 AND club = "real avilés cf" AND goals_against > 60
